titleInfo.title: Meteorological observations taken at Nashville, Tenn. for February 1905

mods.identifier: ESF - Comm - Nash - Govt - Health Dept - Report 1905, back.jpg

location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: Back cover of Official Report of the Board of Health for the City of Nashville, February 1905, giving meteorological observations in Nashville for the month. Data includes maximum, minimum, and mean of temperature, the amount of precipitation, and the cloud cover for each day. Summaries are provided for barometric pressure, highest and lowest temperatures, snowfall and precipitation for the month. Also included in the report are mean temperatures and precipitation totals for the month in previous years, covering the span from 1871 to the present month of the report in 1905. Forms part of the Communities Ephemera Subject Files. Back cover of report : 8.5 x 11 in.
mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital content, which is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed for any other purpose without written permission. Please contact the Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219. Telephone (615) 862-5782.
